page.title: 06UCKFIELD'S INDUSTRY 1.
page.content: Over the past few years there have been many{changes}in Uckfield's industrial scene. The main factory complex is situated just off the southern end of the High Street, access being via the A.22(High Street) until the{by-pass}completion towards the end of 1985.It will then be served by a direct link road from the by-pass, providing welcome relief from industrial traffic. Little use is made of the rail link especially as there is no track south of Uckfield. The site is level and extends almost to the by-pass. At the time of writing there are a number of new factory buildings ready for occupation and a number of plots still vacant.To the north of{Bell Brook Industrial Estate runs an earth rampart to be grassed and planted with trees as a visual and noise barrier for Rocks Park Estate.
